description:
arrow inlaid in lines of brass and silver with "Don't tread on me" inlaid in silver in a banner around the arrow; rattlesnake inlaid in silver and brass lines on other side; knife inlaid in silver on head of tomahawk; "United States we are one" engraved on other side; "W Gusler Wmsbg VA 1995" engraved on top of tomahawk head.
Arms and Armor-Edged Weapon
medium: Curly maple, iron, steel, silver, brass, copper, stag horn
title: Virginia-style (late 1700s - early 1800s) Pipe Tomahawk
